snippet: Eric Asimov explores a wine mystery: why Americans don't buy syrah.
abstract: Eric Asimov explores a wine mystery: why Americans don't buy syrah.
lead_paragraph: "Why don't Americans drink syrah?" This question came up recently at a dinner devoted to exploring the wines of Côte-Rôtie, one of the world's benchmark syrah wines. My column this week considers the various styles of Côte-Rôtie, and inherent in the piece, I think, are some answers worth pondering.

headline.main: Why Syrah Hasn't Caught On in America
